title: Neurophysician
lifestyle: High workload, emergency calls, intellectually demanding
description: A neurophysician (neurologist) diagnoses and treats disorders of the nervous system such as epilepsy, stroke, migraines, and neurodegenerative diseases. The profession requires deep medical knowledge, long study/PG years, and continuous learning.

title: Software Developer
description: A software developer builds applications, systems, or websites. The job involves coding, debugging, and collaborating with product teams. High scalability and opportunities across industries.

title: Data Scientist
description: Data scientists use statistics, machine learning, and programming to extract insights from large datasets. Requires strong math and problem-solving capability.

title: Civil Engineer
lifestyle: Field-heavy work, project deadlines, outdoor activity
description: Civil engineers design and supervise infrastructure projects like roads, buildings, bridges, and water systems.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Graphic designers create visual concepts using software like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva. Strong design thinking needed.
